title: Beckman Coulter, Siemens Healthineers, Abbott, Others Gain 510(k) Clearances in March
summary: The US Food and Drug Administration granted clearances for testing instruments, a blood clot drug companion diagnostic test, and infectious disease tests, among other devices.

title: Agilent Gains IVDR Certification for Expanded Use of CDx Assay for Keytruda
summary: The PD-L1 IHC 22C3 PharmDx (Code SK006) assay is now certified for use to aid treatment decisions for patients with gastric or gastroesophageal junction adenocarcinoma.

title: EntroGen Colorectal Cancer RAS Mutation Detection Test Nabs CMS Coverage
summary: The real-time PCR-based companion diagnostic test identifies patients eligible for treatment with Amgen's Vectibix (panitumumab).

title: EntroGen Colorectal Cancer RAS Mutation Detection Test Nabs CMS Coverage
summary: The real-time PCR-based companion diagnostic test identifies patients eligible for treatment with Amgen's Vectibix (panitumumab).

title: Roche receives FDA breakthrough label for AI-powered lung cancer companion diagnostic test
summary: Roche’s companion diagnostic aims to identify non-small cell lung cancer patients who may benefit from Datroway, an antibody-drug conjugate developed by AstraZeneca and Daiichi Sankyo.

title: FDA Approves Roche Lung Cancer CDx Assay for Use with AbbVie's Emrelis
summary: The test detects the MET protein that is over-expressed in some patients with non-squamous non-small cell lung cancer.

title: Tempus AI, Verastem Partner to Develop CDx Assay for Ovarian Cancer Combination Treatment
summary: Tempus' FDA-approved xT CDx test is being used as an investigational assay in Verastem's global Phase III RAMP-301 clinical trial.

title: Tempus AI, Verastem Partner to Develop CDx Assay for Ovarian Cancer Combination Treatment
summary: Tempus' FDA-approved xT CDx test is being used as an investigational assay in Verastem's global Phase III RAMP-301 clinical trial.

title: Illumina to Offer Pillar Biosciences CDx Assay In Expanded Partnership
summary: This summer, Illumina will begin offering its customers the in vitro diagnostic kit, which detects variants in 22 genes.

title: Illumina to Offer Pillar Biosciences CDx Assay In Expanded Partnership
summary: This summer, Illumina will begin offering its customers the in vitro diagnostic kit, which detects variants in 22 genes.

title: Biocartis Gains IVDR Class C Certification for Lung Cancer CDx
summary: The molecular diagnostics firm's Idylla EGFR Mutation Test is used to guide targeted therapies for patients with non-small cell lung cancer.

title: Biocartis Gains IVDR Class C Certification for Lung Cancer CDx
summary: The molecular diagnostics firm's Idylla EGFR Mutation Test is used to guide targeted therapies for patients with non-small cell lung cancer.

title: ASCO: Guardant blood test guides breast cancer therapy switches, extending survival in AZ-backed study
summary: A new study sponsored by AstraZeneca suggests that using the Guardant360 CDx test to spot early signs of therapy resistance in advanced breast cancer patients and inform a treatment change could slash the risk of disease progression or death by half.

title: Research shows new treatment could delay cancer progression in patients with high-risk smoldering multiple myeloma
summary: A new treatment is showing promise for people with high-risk smoldering multiple myeloma (SMM). This precancerous condition can progress to active multiple myeloma, a type of blood cancer. High-risk SMM carries a higher likelihood of progression.

title: Obesity linked to detection of blood cancer precursor
summary: Individuals with obesity are more likely to have monoclonal gammopathy of undetermined significance (MGUS), a benign blood condition that often precedes multiple myeloma, according to new research.

title: Lenalidomide may delay onset of myeloma-related bone, organ damage
summary: The largest randomized trial in asymptomatic patients with smoldering multiple myeloma suggests that lenalidomide, a cancer drug, may delay the onset of bone and other myeloma-related organ damage.

title: Blood cancer precursor found in 9/11 firefighters
summary: A new study reports that New York City firefighters exposed to the 9/11 World Trade Center disaster site face an increased risk for developing myeloma precursor disease (MGUS), which can lead to the blood cancer multiple myeloma.

title: Cullinan pens $700M pact for BCMA bispecific to pair with another autoimmune T-cell engager
summary: Cullinan Therapeutics is paying $20 million upfront for a BCMAxCD3 bispecific T-cell engager that the biotech plans to pair with its existing CD19 candidate.

title: Randox Laboratories Gains FDA De Novo Clearance for Hemophilia CDx
summary: The Randox ConcizuTrace ELISA is used to determine the concentration in blood of Novo Nordisk's Alhemo (concizumab-mtci) to aid dose adjustments.

title: Cancer tester Caris Life Sciences to go public in $400M Nasdaq IPO
summary: Caris recently began rolling out its MI Cancer Seek companion diagnostic test for genomic tumor profiling.

title: Qiagen, Incyte Partner to Develop Companion Diagnostics for CALR-Mutant, Other Blood Cancers
summary: Qiagen will develop and validate a next-generation sequencing assay, initially targeting the CALR gene, to guide treatment for myeloproliferative neoplasms.

title: Qiagen, Incyte Partner to Develop Companion Diagnostics for CALR-Mutant, Other Blood Cancers
summary: Qiagen will develop and validate a next-generation sequencing assay, initially targeting the CALR gene, to guide treatment for myeloproliferative neoplasms.

title: Thermo Fisher NGS Assay Gets FDA OK as CDx for Dizal's Zegfrovy and for Solid Tumor Profiling
summary: The Oncomine Dx Express Test was approved as a CDx for Dizal's Zegfrovy to identify non-small cell lung cancer patients harboring EGFR exon 20 insertion mutations.

title: Thermo Fisher NGS Assay Gets FDA OK as CDx for Dizal's Zegfrovy and for Solid Tumor Profiling
summary: The Oncomine Dx Express Test was approved as a CDx for Dizal's Zegfrovy to identify non-small cell lung cancer patients harboring EGFR exon 20 insertion mutations.

summary: The Oncomine Dx Target Test assesses if NSCLC patients harbor HER2 tyrosine kinase domain-activating mutations, making them eligible for Boehringer's Hernexeos.

title: FDA Approves Agilent CDx Assay for Use With Bristol Myers Squibb Immunotherapies
summary: The MMR IHC Panel PharmDx (Dako Omnis) is used to identify loss of function in mismatch repair proteins and inform the treatment of colorectal cancer patients.

title: Caris Life Sciences Eyes Wider Clinical Adoption of Tests With New Validation Data
summary: The MI Cancer Seek assay performed equivalently to other FDA-approved tests in a recently published study, and the company is now working to add more CDx claims.

title: Caris Life Sciences Eyes Wider Clinical Adoption of Tests With New Validation Data
summary: The MI Cancer Seek assay performed equivalently to other FDA-approved tests in a recently published study, and the company is now working to add more CDx claims.

summary: The MMR IHC Panel PharmDx (Dako Omnis) is used to determine eligibility for treatment with a combination of Bristol Myers Squibb immunotherapies.

title: Roche Nabs CE-IVDR Marking for HER2 CDx Assay for Breast, Biliary Tract Cancer
summary: The test is approved to help assess HER2-ultralow status to identify breast cancer patients who may be eligible for treatment with Enhertu.

title: Biocartis Gets FDA Approval for MSI Companion Diagnostic
summary: The fully automated, cartridge-based assay is intended to aid oncologists in identifying colorectal cancer patients eligible for immunotherapy treatment.

title: Biocartis Gets FDA Approval for MSI Companion Diagnostic

title: AmoyDx Lung Cancer Panel Nabs Japanese Approval as CDx for Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Drug Ibtrozi
summary: The approval applies to patients with locally advanced or metastatic non-small cell lung cancer with ROS1 gene fusion.

title: Linvoseltamab Promising in High-Risk Smoldering Multiple Myeloma
summary: (MedPage Today) -- TORONTO -- Linvoseltamab (Lynozyfic) appeared effective in patients with high-risk smoldering multiple myeloma (HR-SMM), according to preliminary phase II trial data. With a median follow-up of 3.9 months among 19 evaluable...

title: OGT Assay Nabs FDA Authorization as CDx for Syndax's Revuforj in Acute Leukemia
summary: The CytoCell KMT2A Breakapart FISH Probe Kit PDx detects clinically relevant rearrangements that occur in patients with acute leukemia.

title: Agilent Technologies, Lunit Partner for Cancer CDx Development
summary: The companies will initially focus on the development of companion diagnostics that can be used in research and clinical trials in collaborations with pharma companies.

title: OGT Assay Nabs FDA Authorization as CDx for Syndax's Revuforj in Acute Leukemia
summary: The CytoCell KMT2A Breakapart FISH Probe Kit PDx detects clinically relevant rearrangements that occur in patients with acute leukemia.

summary: Myriad will pursue US regulatory submissions of the assay, while Sophia will manage submissions elsewhere in the world.

title: Myriad Genetics, Sophia Genetics to Collaborate on Cancer Liquid Biopsy Companion Diagnostic

title: Burning Rock's Sequencing Test Approved in Japan as a CDx for Truqap in Breast Cancer
summary: Japanese patients with HER2-negative, hormone receptor-positive advanced breast cancer can now receive testing to guide the use of AstraZeneca's AKT inhibitor.

title: Burning Rock's Sequencing Test Approved in Japan as a CDx for Truqap in Breast Cancer

title: Biocartis Positioning Idylla System for Sample-to-Answer Oncology CDx Tests
summary: A new test to help select colorectal cancer therapy is the first in a menu of rapid cartridge-based tests the firm is planning to support cancer testing.

title: Guardant Health Blood Test Gets FDA OK as CDx for Eli Lilly Breast Cancer Drug Inluriyo
summary: It's the sixth companion diagnostic approval for the Guardant360 comprehensive genomic profiling assay, which is intended to support personalized cancer treatment.

title: Celebrating the 10th Anniversary of its PD-L1 CDx, Agilent Sets Sights on Next-Gen Diagnostic Tools
summary: October marks the 10-year anniversary of the US Food and Drug Administration’s approval of the first companion diagnostic test for a PD-L1 inhibitor.

title: Geneseeq Nabs China NMPA Approval for Pan-Solid Tumor Test as CDx for Roche's Rozlytrek
summary: The company said the assay is China's first sequencing-based pan-solid tumor CDx test and the first approved assay for detecting NTRK1/2/3 gene fusions.

title: Geneseeq Nabs China NMPA Approval for Pan-Solid Tumor Test as CDx for Roche's Rozlytrek
summary: The company said the assay is China's first sequencing-based pan-solid tumor CDx test and the first approved assay for detecting NTRK1/2/3 gene fusions.

title: Promega Receives FDA Approval for OncoMate MSI Dx Analysis System as Endometrial Cancer CDx
summary: The test is meant to identify patients with microsatellite stable endometrial carcinoma who may benefit from treatment with Merck's Keytruda combined with Easai's Lenvima.

title: Promega Receives FDA Approval for OncoMate MSI Dx Analysis System as Endometrial Cancer CDx
summary: The test is meant to identify patients with microsatellite stable endometrial carcinoma who may benefit from treatment with Merck's Keytruda combined with Easai's Lenvima.

title: Promega wins FDA approval as companion diagnostic for Keytruda-Lenvima combo in uterine cancer
summary: Promega has scored an FDA green light for its microsatellite instability testing technology as a companion diagnostic for Merck and Eisai’s Keytruda-Lenvima combination for patients with advanced endometrial carcinoma.

title: Thermo Fisher Receives FDA Approval for NGS-Based CDx for Bayer Lung Cancer Therapy
summary: The test determines patients' eligibility for Hyrnuo, Bayer's new HER2-directed therapy that was approved by the FDA this week for treating non-small cell lung cancer.

title: Thermo Fisher Receives FDA Approval for NGS-Based CDx for Bayer Lung Cancer Therapy
summary: The test determines patients' eligibility for Hyrnuo, Bayer's new HER2-directed therapy that was approved by the FDA this week for treating non-small cell lung cancer.

title: FDA Proposes Reclassification of Companion Diagnostic Tests
summary: The agency would down-classify nucleic acid-based tests for use with a corresponding approved therapy product to Class II devices from Class III.

title: FDA Proposes Reclassification of Companion Diagnostic Tests
summary: The agency would down-classify nucleic acid-based tests for use with a corresponding approved therapy product to Class II devices from Class III.

title: Top Five Articles on 360Dx Last Week: FDA Aims to Reclassify CDx Tests; Tempus Buying OneOme Assets; More
summary: Last week, readers were most interested in a story about FDA's plan to reclassify some tests that now require PMAs to require only 510(k) clearance.

title: FDA Proposal to Reclassify CDx Assays May Broaden Opportunities for Dx Manufacturers, Experts Say
summary: The agency proposed down-classifying companion diagnostic assays to Class II devices from Class III devices.

title: FDA Proposal to Reclassify CDx Assays May Broaden Opportunities for Dx Manufacturers, Experts Say
summary: The agency proposed down-classifying companion diagnostic assays to Class II devices from Class III devices.
